lead_paragraph: President Uhuru Kenyatta apologized on Thursday to the Kenyan people for past wrongs committed by his government and previous ones.

headline.main: Kenya: Official Apology for Past Wrongs
headline.print_headline: Kenya: Official Apology for Past Wrongs

snippet: President Uhuru Kenyatta apologized on Thursday to the Kenyan people for past wrongs committed by his government and previous ones.
